thread.title: Practical location to spend the weekend!
thread.title_full: Practical location to spend the weekend! - Review of Comfotel Prpl, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sallo69
title: Practical location to spend the weekend!
text: My first time but I liked it very much! Great location and fulfilled my needs with breakfast included. Had a very good sleep in a comfort bed! I will definitely come back again soon. Next time I will stay longer and bring my girlfriend.
